execution_plan.description: Compute the number of orders per customer from the Orders table (in orders_db). This reduces data transferred by aggregating orders by customer_id at the source.
execution_plan.query: SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS orders_count FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve customer_id and gender_code for the customers that appear in the aggregated orders from step 1 (in users_db).
execution_plan.query: SELECT customer_id, gender_code FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN ($step1.customer_id);
